name: Project Nimbus
blurb: Take to the sky in this high speed mech action game. Dodge bullets, intercept missiles, defeat your enemies and save the Earth.

rewards.reward: We will honor your name in the game\u2019s end credits as the project\u2019s supporter. And you\u2019ll get Project Nimbus\u2019 KickStarter exclusive wallpaper set for your PC and mobile device, desktop theme, ringtone for your mobile. Plus, 2 tracks from the game's OST in MP3.
Early bird. You\u2019ll get Project Nimbus on Steam when it has come out. This is \u00a33 cheaper than regular price. Plus, you\u2019ll get everything that \u00a31 get.
You\u2019ll get Project Nimbus on Steam when it\u2019s ready, plus original soundtrack album (in MP3 and FLAC).  And  you\u2019ll get everything that \u00a36 get.

Get early alpha access to the game, plus everything that \u00a39 tier get.  Please understand that the early version will be far from complete. The game will keep getting better while it progress to completion. The early alpha access will be accessible at least 3 month before the full game\u2019s release on Steam.

**DIGITAL COMPLETE PACK**\r\nGet digital pdf artbook of Project Nimbus plus everything that \u00a39 tier get: Project Nimbus on Steam when it\u2019s ready, original soundtrack album, honor your name in the game\u2019s end credits as the project\u2019s supporter, KickStarter exclusive wallpaper set for your PC and mobile device, desktop theme, ringtone for your mobile.
You'll get 2 copies of Project Nimbus when it's ready on Steam, plus the original soundtrack album.\r\n\r\nThis is two copies of the \u00a39 tiers.
Get two copies of the early alpha access to the game. This is two copies of the \u00a315 tier.

**REMEMBER ME**
Get yourself into Project Nimbus universe. You'll appear as a pilot in Battle Frame type you choose in a custom color you like, fighting for the faction you believe in, the HUD name will display your name of choice and you can leave 3-4 defeated/engaging/arriving/anything messages with your character, it can be your own submit voice or you can have our voice actor do it. Your machine will be a little bit stronger than a normal machine so the player will spend a little bit more time fighting with it. Your existence will be within this game.

And sure,
You'll get everything that £15 digital complete pack tier get + early alpha access.

**REMEMBER ME, ALTERNATIVE**\r\nThis is similar to the original REMEMBER ME tier. The difference is: You will appear on player's side. On HUD it will display your name on your machine. Even though the player doesn't focus much on you, don't worry. Your voice will always be heard when you're shot down.

*CAPTAIN ON THE BRIDGE (AMERICAN)\r\nSimilar to SQUADRON COMMANDER tier, but instead of those commander type Battle Frame. You'll appear as captain of a Frigate/Destroyer/Cruiser of CFN (US) Navy (which one you'll appeared in, is depend on your choice, and you can name your ship)\r\n*Warning, your ship will be sunk by the player, if it's an American ship, it's usually be sunk when player is in Spetsnaz mission.

*CAPTAIN ON THE BRIDGE (RUSSIAN)\r\nSimilar to SQUADRON COMMANDER tier, but instead of those commander type Battle Frame. You'll appear as captain of a Frigate/Destroyer/Cruiser of USN(Russian) Navy (which one you'll appeared in, is depend on your choice, and you can name your ship)\r\n*Warning, your ship will be sunk by the player, if it's a Russian ship, it's usually be sunk when player is in USAF mission.

*CAPTAIN OF THE SALUSTARIS*

Similar to another 2 ship captain tier. This one will put you as the captain of Children of Fallen Nation's only ship: the Salustaris. It's a stolen and modified from UCN(Russian) Kirov class destroyer.

Player will spend half of a mission fighting your ship. Think of it as a miniboss. So you'll have quite some time for your role play as the captain of the ship.

**SQUADRON COMMANDER**\r\nThis one is the middle between **ACE PILOT** and **REMEMBER ME** tier. Similar to the **REMEMBER ME**, you'll appear in the a Battle Frame you choose in the custom color you like. But you'll get the COMMANDER TYPE version of that Battle Frame. Thus significant stronger than the normal machine (of that model). We will preserve a wave for your (and might be with another one squadron commander's) squadron. Player will spend some time dueling with you. Unlike the **ACE PILOT** tier, you'll not get your very own personal customized machine (but you'll get one of the COMMANDER TYPE). Like both tier, you can leave messages for your persona to talk to player. (and you'll get everything that the Digital Complete Pack get + Early Alpha Access)

**ACE PILOT**
This is similar to the £30 "REMEMBER ME" tier. You'll appear as an enemy ace pilot of the faction you choose, with a customized machine modified from the standard variant as you want. Your machine will be significantly stronger than the standard model. player will spend some time dueling with you and might even loose to it.

We will reserve an enemy wave entirely for you and  your squadron comprise of several of your Battle Frames model of your choice.

Your squadron will have special color scheme.

You'll be able to leave some message that your character will talk when he's fighting against the player. It can be about your war philosophy, what you desire to do to change this world, your life perspective, what's the meaning of life to you, anything. You can submit your own voice or you can choose to have our voice actor do it. Your customized machine will be playable after the player have beat it. It will appear like "M5 Viper: <your name>'s personal custom machine"

And yes, you'll get everything that £15 digital complete pack tier get + early alpha access.

*CHILDREN OF FALLEN NATION, NUMBER FOUR*\r\nChildren of Fallen Nation terrorist group has 4 warlord.  Right now, there're 3 in the game story so there's 1 spot opening. This is similar to the ACE PILOT tier. The difference is, your Battle Frame will be designed from the ground up by your request. Your character will has character's theme music composed by our composer. Player will duel with your in-game persona twice. The second time your character appeared it will be killed. Since it will appear twice, you can choose to equip it with 2 different weapon load out (both load out will be playable). The performance of your machine will be deadly. **You have to hate this planet to the point that you want to destroy human civilization or at least you shall have feeling that the world is not fair and you want to take revenge against it or something to be happy to pledge for this tier.

*WORLD END WEAPON
Right now, we have 3 dooms-day weapon in the game: A colossal 500m. tall giant robot, A very large space fortress, and a giant weapon colony that is dropped to the Earth surface in the end of the game.

Want to add another one? Your call. Tell us the idea. What is it the weapon capable to destroy human civilization in your dream? Player will have to destroy it to save human race. There'll be a mission dedicated to fighting your gigantic toy.
